column4: Everytime I try to uninstall GAIM it tries to uninstall ubuntu-desktop (which in turn decides to try to uninstall everything)
afaik, ubuntu-desktop is just a metapackage, so i heard that it's safe to uninstall?
ah yeah, anytime i install something using the apt-get command it comes up "use autoremove to uninstall <every base package>" though
